    • getInstance

      public static ViewModel getInstance(EntityController _entityController, MenuController _menuController, ParticipantController _participantController)
      Creates a new InteractionManager instance for this application if no instance exists, or returns the current instance.
      Parameters:
      _entityController - the application EntityManager.
      _menuController - the application MenuFactory.
      _participantController - a stack of entities.
      Returns:
      the single InteractionManager instance for this application.

    • progressMenuInteraction

      public void progressMenuInteraction() throws DateTimeParseException, IOException, SQLException
      Provides options for the user to update the progress(due date, date finalized) of the selected project.
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException - if the date provided by the user is invalid.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      SQLException - if an error occurs while writing to the database.
